ygData.subject: Re: SV: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh - of course this arguement could be fruitless is the cap has already been removed.  Actually I m surprised that more gnomes haven t commented about which
ygData.messageBody:
Heh - of course this arguement could be fruitless is the cap has already
been removed. Actually I'm surprised that more gnomes haven't commented
about which cap is real.

How about everyone on the list whose OVER lvl 16 and has practiced
tinkering send a quick note and state what your current skill in tinkering
is?

For me - I'm lvl 27 and my skill is currently 65 (which incidently means
that the cap has been removed or the [(lvl-15)*5] formula is incorrect.
The other cap formula suggests my limit is 122. Unfortunately I do not
have enough cash to prove or disprove that number). However I'm not sure
if it's "capped" at 65 - I just happened to stop at that level. This
weekend I plan on practicing a lot more to see how far I can raise it.

QdP

--- Joe D <joed@...> wrote:
>
> Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...>:
> > (Level - 15) * 5
>
> Diablokilr@...:
> > Level x 5 - 13
>
> "Duck season!"
>
> "Rabbit season!"
>
> "Duck season!"
>
> "Rabbit season!"
>
> My gnome is currently level 13. The only stuff I've tinkered is the
> stuff
> that trivials at 50. When I hit 16, probably in the next week or so, I
> can
> settle this. According to one of you, I should max out at 55.
> According to
> the other, I should max out at 67.
>
> Joe D
>
<HR>
<html>
>
